# typescript

# 数据类型

  • any: 任意数据类型
 let params : any
 params = 1
 params = "str"
 params = undefined
 params = true
 params = {
     name:'typescript'
 }
  • number: 数值类型
 let count : number
 count = 1
 count = true // 报错
  • string: 字符串类型
 let str : string = 'hello typescript'
  • boolean: 布尔类型
 let flag : boolean = true
  • []: 数组类型
 let arr : Array<any> = [1,'hello',false,undefined,{name:'php'}]
 let arrNum : number[] = [1,2,3]
 let arrAny : any[] = [1,'helllo',true,[1,2]]
  • 元组: 元素类型和数量已知的数组
    • 各元素的类型不必相同，对应位置的类型需要相同
 let arr : [number,string,boolean,undefined,object]
 arr = [1,'',false,undefined,{}]
  • 对象: object
 let obj : object = {
     name:'php',
     age:18
 }
 function test(o : object | null) : void{

 }
 test(1) // 报错
  • null: 表示对象值缺失
    typeof null => object
  • undefined: 表示一个未赋值的变量
    let a; typeof a => undefined
  • void: 用于表示函数没有返回值
function test() : void{
    console.log('test')
}
  • 联合类型:
  let param : number | string
  param = 1
  param = 'php'

# 类型断言

  • 类似于类型转换
 let someValue : any = "this is a string"
 let strLength : number = (<string>someValue).length

 let someValue : any = "this is a string"
 let strLength : number = (somevalue as string).length

# 接口

  • 接口可以定义属性和方法
  • 接口不能编译为 JavaScript, 它只是 TypeScript 的一部分
  • 接口中的属性和方法必须全部实现
 // 定义一个接口
 interface TestInterface {
     name : string,
     age : number,
     say:()=>string
 }
 // 实现一个接口
 let obj : TestInterface= {
     name:'php',
     age:18,
     say(){
         return 'hello typescript'
     }
 }
  • 联合类型的接口
 interface RunOptions { 
     program:string; 
     commandline:string[]|string|(()=>string); 
 } 
 
 // commandline 是字符串
 let options:RunOptions = {program:"test1",commandline:"Hello"}; 
 
 // commandline 是字符串数组
 options = {program:"test1",commandline:["Hello","World"]}; 
 
 // commandline 是一个函数表达式
 options = {program:"test1",commandline:()=>{return "**Hello World**";}}; 
 
 let fn:any = options.commandline; 
 console.log(fn());
  • 继承
    1. 单继承
      interface Person { 
  age:number 
  } 
  
  interface Musician extends Person { 
  instrument:string 
  } 
  
  var drummer = <Musician>{}; 
  drummer.age = 27 
  drummer.instrument = "Drums" 
  console.log("年龄:  "+drummer.age)
  console.log("喜欢的乐器:  "+drummer.instrument)
    1. 多继承
      interface IParent1 { 
      v1:number 
  } 
  
  interface IParent2 { 
      v2:number 
  } 
  
  interface Child extends IParent1, IParent2 { } 
  var Iobj:Child = { v1:12, v2:23} 
  console.log("value 1: "+Iobj.v1+" value 2: "+Iobj.v2)
